short_summary: Demolishing the existing slab and foundation walls down to the existing footing and constructing a new concrete loading dock, stairs and associated foundations plus a new guardrail. Then provide new site grading and asphalt paving.
description: The contract involves demolishing the existing slab and foundation walls down to the existing footing and constructing a new concrete loading dock, stairs and associated foundations plus a new guardrail. Then provide new site grading and asphalt paving.
